oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Meloxicam Administration Mitigates Behavioral and Performance Effects of Scoop Dehorning Without Local Anesthesia in Weaned Holstein Calves
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mosher, R. A.
Coetzee, J. F.
KuKanich, B.
Gehring, R.
Robert, B.
Pauly, C. R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: meloxicam
serum cortisol
dehorning
scoop dehorning
anesthesia
heart rate
behavior
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study was conducted to determine the pharmacokinetics of meloxicam and its effect on serum cortisol, heart rate, behavior, and weight gain in calves after scoop dehorning without local anesthesia.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2010; 226
